Articles.Content:
Please help me, this started like 2 days ago. 

I cant hold some objects, i cant right-click and i cant even rotate my camera. (Version is 1.12)

Mods that i use: 999_KSP-Recall, AviatorArsenal, B9_Aerospace_ProceduralWings, BDArmory, Firespitter, NearFutureProps, PlanetaryBaseInc, PhysicsRangeExtender, RetractibleLiftingSurface, RetroFuture, SCANsat, SM_Industries, SXT, TweakScale and VesselMover.

I hope this is the right forum, thanks in advance! 

https://imgur.com/a/eNSxlIw is the video.

 

Fix: I think there were some incompatible mods that I used, I deleted some and KSP worked like brand new!

 

Edited November 2, 2021 by Proxbi Kerman
Found a fix
Welcome to the forum @Proxbi Kerman, your issue has been moved from KSP discussion to tech support(PC, modded).
